name: Sesame Seeds
properties: Part of Daily Dozen nuts and seeds
Best when structurally intact (not as tahini)
benefits: Sesame seeds are nutrient-dense seeds that provide calcium, minerals, and beneficial lignans. As part of the Daily Dozen nuts and seeds category, they contribute to the ideal weight-loss diet. They add nutritional value and texture to dishes.
amount: Part of 1 serving nuts/seeds daily (1 tablespoon seeds), typically used as garnish

quotes: 1 tablespoon sesame seeds - Sprinkle with the spring onion, sesame seeds and nori strips
